title: Ep52 Road Rage Crimes
description: This week, the gals buckle up to cover highway homicides. Topics include a wild-eyed former aspiring model with a bad temper, a rabbi with an authority complex, and dangerous driving in Los Angeles. Paired with this episode is Winc's 2012 So This Happened... Red Blend, so park your car before pouring a glass, take a few deep breaths, and settle in for Road Rage Crimes.   This episode is supported by TalkSpace. Get $30 off your first month with promo code "GALS" www.talkspace.com/gals
